title: What minor key signature has 6 double flats? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can see no purpose whatsoever in writing in a key that has double flats. Such keys are theoretical only. There is no “value-add” in my mind to writing in such a key.
Alright I'll bite. E double flat minor would have 6 double flats and one normal flat. (I think, off the top of my head). Who asks these questions?
